name: Kill the Ragdoll Science Shot
description:
Dismount the ragdoll in and push him hard from rooftop. Be a savage torturer!

Throw the ragdoll into gravity from the rooftop chamber and watch him fall down stairs! Unleash your savage torturing skills and dismount this 3D ragdoll crazily. Earn as much pain points as you can with more and more torture. Sounds crazy? Well craft the ragdoll to throw down stairs and produce more pain points. Super fun physics with savage torturing theme! Best fun in quick time!

Don’t wait to download this ragdoll falling game – Kill the Ragdoll Science Shot now and share with your friends and families :)
Happy Torturing!
